Info box

Where does Africa fit in the Belt and Road Initiative?

Where does Africa fit in the Belt and Road Initiative? A trillion dollars, more than 70% of the world’s population, and huge ambition are woven together in China’s Belt and Road Initiative (BRI). Called ‘one belt, one road’ in Chinese, it’s a revival of China’s ancient transcontinental land and sea silk roads. But there is little nostalgia in BRI.

  • Tab two
  • Tab three
  • Tab four
